name: kannada
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a language spoken in southwestern India: She speaks a dialect of Kannada. Swarga means "heaven" in Kannada.
More examplesFewer examplesThe official language of Karnataka is Kannada.Kannada is a Dravidian language.He can even find movies in Kannada, his native language.

in or of the Kannada language: "Nombu" is a Kannada word meaning fasting. The song is inspired by a 16th-century Kannada poem.
More examplesFewer examplesLife in Karnataka will be much easier if you know a few Kannada words.In the old city, the Kannada names come from castes and occupations and bazaars.Rajkumar was the greatest champion of Kannada cinema.
